multiple_choice.choice: When there is a lack of phosphorus in the body.
When the bone is immobilized for an extended time.
When the bone is exposed to regular stress.

response.feedback: Incorrect. If there is a lack of phosphorus in the body you cannot incorporate it into building new bone.
Incorrect. The osteocytes activate the osteoblasts.
Incorrect. When a bone is immobilized for an extended time the bone breaks down which is the job of the osteoclasts.
Correct. When a bone is placed under stress it grows thicker which is the function of the osteoblast.
